channel.title: Bluurrs client + non bluurr server = wont connect HELP PLEASE
channel.description:
i have a blurs client theat i edited alot and like but the problem is when i connect itll log in for like 30 seconds and saying loading please wait then ill get disconected to the main menu
is there a way to install bluurrs client thingy into a server so it doesnt disconect

item.title: Bluurrs client + non bluurr server = wont connect HELP PLEASE
item.dc:creator: @gooasco gooasco
item.description:
@gooasco wrote:

IT refused conection

and 2 compile errors

// TODO: yet some things to figure out on this block + properly implement this playerProps.writeByte(playerLook[0]); // player sex. 0=Male and 1=Female // playerProps.writeByte(1 & 1 >> 2); // playerStatusMask - skull, prayers etc alkup 0 playerProps.writeByte(skulls); playerProps.writeByte(hint); playerProps.writeByte(headIcon);

item.title: Bluurrs client + non bluurr server = wont connect HELP PLEASE
item.dc:creator: @_icestorm ~*icestorm*~
item.description:
@_icestorm wrote:

See at the very bottom were it says playerProps.writeByte(headIcon);

You want to add this above it playerProps.writeByte(skulls); playerProps.writeByte(hint);

So it looks like this playerProps.writeByte(skulls); playerProps.writeByte(hint); playerProps.writeByte(headIcon);

item.title: Bluurrs client + non bluurr server = wont connect HELP PLEASE
item.dc:creator: @gooasco gooasco
item.description:
@gooasco wrote:

no its not there sadly but this is what i see
(the bottom is the 1st code i searched)

[code] // with the clients yet or changed recently

protected static stream playerProps;
static {
    playerProps = new stream(new byte[100]);
}
protected void appendPlayerAppearance(stream str) {
    playerProps.currentOffset = 0;

    // TODO: yet some things to figure out on this block + properly implement this
    playerProps.writeByte(playerLook[0]); // player sex. 0=Male and 1=Female
    // playerProps.writeByte(1 & 1 >> 2);		// playerStatusMask - skull, prayers etc alkup 0
    playerProps.writeByte(headIcon);[/code]

now what i do

WILL REPLY FAST IF POSSABLE

item.title: Bluurrs client + non bluurr server = wont connect HELP PLEASE
item.dc:creator: @_icestorm ~*icestorm*~
item.description:
@_icestorm wrote:

Sure, open up player.java and search for this playerProps.writeByte(headIcon);

Once you done that see if this is right above it playerProps.writeByte(skulls); playerProps.writeByte(hint);

If its not save and compile then try it again, If it is there then just post back or if it doesnt work just post back

item.source: Bluurrs client + non bluurr server = wont connect HELP PLEASE

item.title: Bluurrs client + non bluurr server = wont connect HELP PLEASE
item.dc:creator: @_icestorm ~*icestorm*~
item.description:
@_icestorm wrote:

Bluurr’s client checks for head icon bits like this in player.java

playerProps.writeByte(headIcon);

Im not sure if this will work as I dont use bluurr’s but try adding this ABOVE what I posted above

playerProps.writeByte(skulls); playerProps.writeByte(hint);
Make sure you do it in that order or you will get problems, I did

If this didn’t work post back and ill try to help you again

Read full topic
